definition: Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang
abbr. for Macao 澳門|澳门/abbr. for Australia 澳大利亞|澳大利亚
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: We will accelerate the pilot program for the mainland, Hong Kong and Macao to use RMB as the settlement currency for trade in goods.
sentences.chinese: 加快推进与港澳地区货物贸易的人民币结算试点。

sentences.english: U. S. users all over the country and Hong Kong and Macao regions.
sentences.chinese: 我们的用户遍及全国及港澳地区。

sentences.english: And are of foreign nationality and Hong Kong and Macao child.
sentences.chinese: 而且都是外国籍和港澳地区的孩子。

sentences.english: The export of frozen chicken to Hong Kong and Macao shall still be subject to relevant regulations as are practised to date.
sentences.chinese: 对港澳地区出口冻鸡仍按现行的有关规定执行。

definition: Hong Kong 香港 and Macao 澳門|澳门
Pan-Pearl River delta/The nine provinces of Southern China around Guangzhou and the Pearl River delta/South China
Hong Kong 香港, Macao 澳門|澳门 and Taiwan 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
mainland China (PRC excluding Hong Kong and Macau, but including islands such as Hainan)/Japan (used in Taiwan during Japanese colonization)
Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, established in 2017, consisting of Hong Kong, Macao and nine cities in Guangdong
pinyin: Yue4 Gang3 Ao4 Da4 wan1 Qu1

definition: abbr. for Macao 澳門|澳门/abbr. for Australia 澳大利亞|澳大利亚
Zhuhai prefecture level city in Guangdong province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3] in south China

special administrative region (SAR), of which there are two in the PRC: Hong Kong 香港 and Macau 澳門|澳门/refers to many different areas during late Qing, foreign occupation, warlord period and Nationalist government/refers to special zones in North Korea and Indonesia
